name: PixelMate
description:
The game is made for the 7th Official Brackeys Game Jam with the theme ‘It Is Not Real’.

This is a dating simulator game that features Chatting Room System, RPG Battle System and Fully Handmade Pixel-Art Assets.

--------------------------------------

Short summary:

You always hated Valentine’s day. Seeing other couples holding hands irked you. You dreamt that one day you could hold the hand of someone that you love dearly.

Out of the blue, a strange notification sound shouted from your phone. A strange application called PixelMate suddenly appeared in the middle of your home screen. You decided to check what this application is about. 

You’re suddenly matched with 3 extraordinarily beautiful women. Do you dare to chat with them and change your fate on this dreaded Valentine’s day?

 -------------------------------------- 

Controls & Tutorial: 

The game is designed for point and click in mouse control.

Your job is to increase the affection bar of the pixel mate that you picked through the apps. Once the bar is full, you could ask your pixel mate for a date. Then on the dates, your job is to melt her heart and propose her by giving her a gift! However, be careful, she might think that you're too straightforward if you reduce her Heart Point (HP) bar to zero but at the same time, you have to increase your chance for her to accept your gift her by reducing her HP bar!
